ExperienceSummary.ExecutiveBrief: Phanidhar Oruganti has been working in the IT occupational sector for more than 7 years. Currently he is employed as an Oracle DBA at Fiserv Inc. Phanidhar has extensive knowledge of Oracle, SQL, Oracle Recovery Manager, UNIX, Original Equipment Manufacturer, Oracle 9i, Microsoft SQL*Loader, Linux Red Hat, Informatica, HTML, ETL, AIX UNIX, shell scripting, Oracle SQLNet, Oracle PL/SQL, Oracle Enterprise Manager, Oracle Data Guard, Oracle 10G, Linux, Oracle 11g, ORACLE QA, Microsoft SQL Server. So far Phanidhar has not gained any managerial experience.
